company.name: BlackRock Long Term Municipal Advantage Trust

title: Historical Stock Splits and Corporate Actions for BlackRock Long Term Municipal Advantage Trust

content.text: The BlackRock Long Term Municipal Advantage Trust is launched as a closed-end fund.
BlackRock announces a 2-for-1 stock split of BTA, effectively doubling the number of shares available.
The fund changes its name from BlackRock Long Term Municipal Advantage Trust to BlackRock Municipal Advantage Trust.
BlackRock Municipal Advantage Trust merges with BlackRock Municipal Income Trust (BLE) in a tax-free transaction. The resulting fund retains the name BlackRock Municipal Advantage Trust (BTA).
BlackRock announces a 2-for-1 stock split of BTA, doubling the number of shares.
BlackRock Municipal Advantage Trust undergoes an organizational meeting to renew the Trust's existence and elect certain officers and trustees.
The closing market price of BTA stock is $11.15.

news.headline: GameStop’s new investment policy called ‘alarming’ and ‘inane’
news.summary: GameStop's board of directors has approved a new investment policy, which lets the company invest in equity securities.
